Description:
CENTRAL FLORA HILL WINNER
Live the nostalgia of the 70s in this neat light filled Flora Hill winner.
Set on a 650m2 block in central Ellis Street sits this well-kept and neatly presented three bedroom two bathroom home featuring a sunroom, an abundance of natural light and period style details complimenting its original appeal.
Refurbishing and updating would be idyllic with its floor plan and original fittings creating the perfect foundations to bring this abode into the modern era while still highlighting its character.
The kitchen is a standout with its spacious layout, floor to ceiling storage cupboards and modern quality appliances.
The master bedroom is impressive with its size, walk in robe, ensuite with separate toilet and views of the gardens.
All three bedrooms, large laundry with outdoor access and a neat light filled main bathroom makes up the rest of the features in the hallway at the back of the property.
Outside, the beautiful large lemon tree sets the scene of the serene backyard; easy maintenance garden beds, a powered timber lock-up workshop/storage and separate clothes line area.
Located only 2kms to Bendigo CBD and around the corner to La Trobe University, schools, kindergarten, day care, local shops, Kennington and Strath village shopping centres and public transport.
Call Shelby today to inspect

Description:
Attention All Trotting Enthusiasts
As soon as you enter "Rocket Ville" you will notice the attention to detail that has been put into this property from the gateways to the fencing and a 800 meter trotting track that has been engineered and designed to the highest standards. The property consists of 26 acres a 3 bedroom brick veneer home, 6 stables and excellent shedding and fencing.
Within the home you will find timber cathedral ceilings in the living and kitchen /dinning and as you head down the hallway there are 3 good size bedrooms with built in robes a 3 piece bathroom and en suite off the main bedroom. At the end of the hall is a large room suitable for a second living, rumpus / hobby room or very large office.
Outside all the gardens are low maintenance with an area for your vegetable garden and options to extend if you wish.
Down at the stables you will also see that all the hard work has been done with a large shed (24m x 8m), wash pen, sand lunging ring, steel yards, crush loading bay and many more additions.
Options to expand are also available as the stables were designed that the 6 could easily be designed to 12 if needed and their is plenty of room to add or redesign to suit. With 4 large water tanks and a stock and domestic bore the water has been taken care of not to forget the 4 meg dam designed to be used to swim the horses through as it is 80m long x 28m wide and 3m deep.
The property is fenced into 9 paddocks and has the seasonal Sweeney Creek running through it where there is one small paddock over the creek.
Call today for a private inspection

Description:
One Acre on Town Water
This attractive home is perfectly set up for summer enjoyment.
A cool green haven surrounds this fine family home, the established gardens are spectacular.
From the sparkling pool to the huge undercover pergola leading straight out from the kitchen, to the fantastic shedding at the rear of the property. The interior of the home is beautifully presented from front to back. This property has:
Plenty of room to store the boat or caravan, or maybe a mens shed set up
Four bedrooms upstairs with ensuite and family bathroom with ducted cooling for these hot days
Downstairs offers 4 living areas, Formal lounge, Rumpus Games Room, Sitting room, and Family room
An extra powder room off the laundry
Casual dining area and Formal dining area with an updated dream kitchen that has plenty of storage and bench space to satisfy any cook
Fully covered resort style pergola, perfect for family barbeques and next to your very own pool
Yes it has the lot, beautifully built and lovingly maintained by the original owners, especially the garden and manicured paths
Close to the schools and shops this home invites a private inspection to appreciate how lovely it is

Description:
Packed with Potential.
Add to the investment portfolio and bring in additional rental income with this North Bendigo three-bedroom opportunity.
Or invest, refresh and occupy for yourself as a first home buyer, this home has plenty of potential to make it your comfortable retreat.
Set on a generous 758 square metre block and close to North Bendigo Sporting facilities, Prouses Road Recreation Reserves, Bendigo Health and schools or a short drive into the CBD the location is set to delight.
Refurbishing and updating would be idyllic with its floor plan creating the perfect foundation to bring this abode into the modern era while still highlighting its character.
The kitchen offers all the essentials including a stove top, oven, overhead storage and the perfect footprint for a fresh fit out.
Each bedroom offers built-in robes and is serviced by the main bathroom featuring a beautiful leadlight window - and separate toilet.
Ceiling fans, gas heater and electric air conditioner in the lounge adds to this property's comfort and investment potential.
Outside is where the opportunity continues with the space providing an open canvas to create your own style.
Vehicle access to the right of the home, paving, a concreted garden shed, plenty of shady trees creating additional privacy and a back patio adds to home's appeal.
A walk to nearby Prouses Road and North Bendigo Recreation Reserve and close to Bendigo Bendigo Health, schools, daycares and Bendigo CBD the location is a standout.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes to arrange your inspection today.
Internal area
96m²

Description:
Invest, Downsize or First home!
Situated at the rear of an established complex, this brick veneer unit offers a neat and spacious environment in an ideal location.
The property comprises of a spacious open living area with split system and gas heating for all year-round comfort, functional kitchen with gas cooking, two good sized bedrooms each with built-in-robes, a tasteful three-piece bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Externally there is a single lock up garage with access to the enclosed courtyard and secure fenced yard. There is an abundance of visitor car parking around the unit and the complex abuts a lovely nature reserve to one side.
This low maintenance, light and bright unit has been recently repainted and refurbished throughout ready for its new owners.
Public transport is out the front, with a convenience store and school very close by. Located close to the Bendigo Hospital and the city, this unit would also make an ideal investment opportunity.
** COVID 19 **
This property is available to inspect by appointment only. To arrange your private viewing please contact the agent or our office on 03 5444 2526.
While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property.

Address: 3/27 Little Breen Street Quarry Hill VIC 3550
Description:
City Central Living.
Sound investments are all about the return and the location - this one ticks both boxes.
This tidy three-bedroom townhouse in a city-edge setting is the ideal live-in or let-out proposition.
The main bedroom enjoys access to the two-way bathroom and separate toilet, while the remaining two bedrooms open off the central hallway.
There's a spacious lounge room at the front and an open-style kitchen/dining/living basking in northern light and winter sunshine at the end of the hallway.
The kitchen boasts gas cooktop, electric under-bench oven, pantry cupboard and plenty of storage.
Sliding doors from the dining area open to a fully-enclosed, secure backyard with a paved area for outdoor dining.
A single lock-up carport and maintenance-free landscaping complete the neat package currently leased at $290 per week to a happy tenant willing to stay on if possible.
The rear townhouse in a complex of four offers extra privacy and security and a top location mere steps from everything you could ever need ditch the car and walk to CBD shops, railway station, cafes, cinema, etc.
** COVID 19 **
This property is available to inspect by appointment only. To arrange your private viewing please contact the agent or our office on 03 5444 2526.
While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property.

Description:
Prestige and Position
Positioned in a lovely private court in popular Strathfieldsaye, this immaculate contemporary family home is just minutes from everything you need. This home presents beautifully, from street appeal through to the open plan living. The impressive open plan kitchen allows free flowing spaces between indoor and outdoor entertaining. The large main bedroom offers built in robes and a large ensuite with double shower plus a rain head shower. The remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the large family bathroom.
The home is designed with the creature comforts in mind, offering ducted reverse cycle heating and refrigerated cooling. An oversized garage with direct access to the rear yard plus an additional area for trailer storage to the left of the home. The fully landscaped garden is irrigated and established with mature trees creating a feeling of privacy.
First home buyers should be able to capitalise on the $20,000 First Home Owners Grant plus reduced stamp duty while an astute investor can collect $420 per week as the property is leased until 12 April 2021.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with built in robes and ensuite
Ducted reverse cycle heating & refrigerated air conditioning
Caesar-stone benchtops
Open plan living
Outside Features:
Extra Large Double garage with auto door and access to rear yard
Secure fencing
Alfresco area
3.0 kw Solar panels
Watering system and trailer storage
With easy living in mind the open plan design maximizes the size of the allotment, which is located within walking distance to the fantastic local primary school, sports oval, cafes, bakeries, shopping centre and healthcare, just to name just a few.

Description:
HARMONIOUS FAMILY DOMAIN IN EXCLUSIVE ILLOURA PLACE
A quality home built with attention to detail awaits at 12 Illoura Place.
Set on 873m2 of land with nearly 280m2 of living, this impeccably designed home has clean modern lines and a luxurious interior with great natural light.
There is an oversize triple garage with much storage, a grand entry hallway, 4 bedrooms with robes and a study/5th bedroom, spacious main and ensuite bathrooms, powder room, large living area with polished concrete floor, beautiful kitchen with large walk-in pantry, tall raked ceilings, large windows and a second living area that also integrates outward to the garden and large in-ground pool.
A large covered alfresco area adjoins the pool and gardens, ready for a private, relaxed outdoor lifestyle.The home has solar boosted hot water, back to grid solar and solar heated pool.
Enjoy quality surrounds with nearby bush-lands, sporting facilities, schools and shops all nearby.

Description:
A Great Location and Affordable
Here is the perfect opportunity to get into the market. This terrific 3 bedroom cream brick veneer with terracotta tiled roof is set on a generous 831 sq.m corner allotment. The lounge room has large windows that look out onto the gorgeous front native garden which attracts a variety of bird life. The front verandah makes an ideal private place to sit and enjoy the serenity. Partly updated kitchen with near new dishwasher and gas cooking,Three piece central bathroom and separate toilet. Other features include ducted gas heating ,evaporative cooling plus a solar system. Double carport with double gates to access rear yard plus large garden shed. Great sized fully secure back yard and undercover entertaining area. Close to Epsom Shopping Centre, Schools, Bunnings, Botanical Gardens and much more.

Description:
The Choice Is Yours !!
Such a rare opportunity to purchase this B/V home set on 2735 sq.m allotment. Zoned residential with two street access, ideal for subdivision (STCA). The spacious home offers 3 bedrooms (all with BIR'S).Main with ensuite plus a private courtyard. Family bathroom and ensuite both require renovation. Huge lounge with timber cathedral ceilings and cosy solid fuel heater. Original country style kitchen with plenty of space for meals area. 2nd toilet off laundry.
Ducted evaporative cooling. Central atrium which could quite easily be converted to a 4th bedroom/study if required. Double carport with roller door, undercover outdoor entertaining, shed (no power or concrete), beautiful lily pond with a bridge. Good fencing. Close to Huntly shops, school and much more. Perfect for a tradie looking for a project or for somebody looking for lots of space.

Description:
LIFESTYLE PROPERTY/HOBBY FARM WITH THE WHOLE PACKAGE.
This beautiful BV home built by a local Master builder, set on almost 16 acres (approx.. 6.13 Ha) and located in the picturesque Lockwood area, welcomes you to sit back, relax and enjoy a lifestyle like no other.
The elevated residence offers spacious family living starting with versatile formal lounge room and a central living room, both serviced by a large, double-fronted wood heater that is situated in the middle of these 2 rooms creating double the ambience. Adjoining this is a home office with convenient external access and a huge family/rumpus room where a wall of North-facing windows beam light into every corner.
Sleeping accommodation is all large in size, consisting of a main bedroom with walk in robe, and stunning, newly renovated, large ensuite, equipped with double basins, full bath, toilet and shower. 3 more good sized bedrooms, all with robes and ceiling fans, share the updated family bathroom.
The large family sized kitchen features electric cooking appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry and more storage than most homes, with a family sized dining area and storage-rich, well-equipped laundry alongside.
An expansive alfresco area runs the length of the house and adjoins the fenced 10m x 4m inground pool, making an ideal setting for large scale entertaining for all age groups. There is more though, where sweeping lawns flow down to a full sized tennis court, which is fully fenced with brand new LED flood-lit lighting. The views from this area are just breath taking with rolling hills behind the tennis court to add to the postcard look. The undulating property includes: excellent rainwater storage (approx.. 75,000 litres), three dams (with the main one full), plus a bore. The property is divided into 5 paddocks, with new fencing, and bordered by a pretty seasonal creek with fertile flats on one side and State Forest at the rear. Shedding includes: a 3 bay carport, 3 car garage & workshop with concrete floor and power, PLUS extra shedding with power, concrete floor and water.
Located approx.. 6 kms from all Kangaroo Flat facilities, this one ticks all the boxes. It is a tranquil escape where adults can enjoy life in the slow lane, and the kids can swim, play tennis or basketball, have some pets, grow some veggies, have some chooks, ride a horse or a motorbike, have a picnic down on the creek, or just beat about the bush out the back.
Sometimes words are not enough, so bring the family out to see for themselves. Once seen this one will be hard to forget. This property has created so many wonderful memories and events for the current Vendors, and they know the next owners will love and enjoy the property just as they have.
Inspection a must to appreciate this lifestyle property.
Insights: 661 Lockwood Road, Lockwood VIC 3551 was last sold in 2000 and 1 other 4 bedroom house in Lockwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle & Luxury In Aspirational Maiden Gully
If you don't want to compromise on style, space or quality, then 25 Eden Way is for you. With a fantastic layout, and premium finishes throughout this property will impress you from the moment you step through the door. Offering two great sized separate living zones, and 3 generous bedrooms along with a huge open plan living, dining and meals area.
Master bedroom boasts walk in robe while the ensuite features his and hers basins in the large vanity.
Bedrooms 2 and 3 both have built in robes and are serviced by the ducted heating and cooling which runs throughout.
But there are two jewels that really shine in this stunning home, the large stone top island bench in the kitchen which boasts seating for breakfast or the currently popular "work-from-home" desk. The kitchen offer gas cooktop, ample storage and walk-in pantry.
The second jewel is huge alfresco area which offers exposed aggregate underfoot, down lights and provisions for an outdoor tv set up.
To top this of the home has double lock up garage as well as side access, and makes clever use of the generous block allowing for a great size yard to kids or back yard cricket enthusiasts.
Finally, if the offer is not enough, Eden Way is just a 10 minute walk from the stunning, award winning Balgownie Estate Winery.
Further, Maiden Gully IGA is 3 minutes by car, as is Maiden Gully Primary while Marist College is 4 minutes away.
This is a complete package and will not last. Call Sacha now!

Description:
ESCAPE INTO YOUR OWN PRIVATE SANCTUARY!
This is one of the finest Murray Wearne built masterpieces. Designed & constructed to showcase impressive craftsmanship - it is a modern delight!
- Nestled away at the end of Merlot Close, this is a vibrant family friendly suburb
- Upon entrance you will be captivated. Exposed aggregate driveway, large triple garage and a delightful facade
- Featuring a flowing floor plan with high ceilings, an abundance of natural light and features striking polished concrete flooring
- Four large bedrooms, two bathrooms, plus separate powder room, study and formal lounge
- Complete with attractive entertaining areas, also offering excellent storage and parking
- A stunning central open plan kitchen featuring a huge walk in butler's pantry, stone bench-top, induction cook-top & quality stainless-steel appliances
- Spacious meals and family zone, with an additional separate lounge. Offering flexibility & space for the entire family
- Unique & relaxed outside living spaces with timber alfresco decking, the perfect nook to escape too
- Sliding door access from the open plan zone to the undercover alfresco, complete with outdoor kitchen / BBQ overlooking the lush lawn
- Extras include ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, separate study and an ever so handy storage shed at the rear
- Triple car garage with roller door access through to the landscaped yard
Why would you build when you can take the stress out of the process & move straight into the finished designer product. This home will capture your heart!
Directions: Turn off the Calder Highway into Lower Beckham's Road, continue all the way to the end & enter Meadows Gate Estate, turn left into Cabernet Drive, which runs into Merlot Close.

Description:
OVER SIX ACRES JUST DOWN THE ROAD FROM THE LODDON RIVER
Located in the heart of the pretty Loddon Shire, with Kooyoora State Park, Waanyarra Nature Conservation Reserve, Bridgewater on Loddon and Lake Laanecoorie all just minutes away, is this homestead on over six acres and bordered by established trees. Just half an hour from all the city amenities of Bendigo, the property offers a lush, private, rural farmlet that is still close to everything.
A wide verandah runs across both the front and the rear of the house, providing the perfect place to sit with a cuppa in the sunshine regardless of the time of day. The front door opens into a living room, with a fireplace providing added warmth and atmosphere in the winter. The living space leads into a kitchen and dining room and the kitchen enjoys vintage cabinetry.
A hallway from the kitchen and lounge take you to the three bedrooms, all with built-in robes, along with a large laundry; a family bathroom; and a separate toilet.
Outdoors, a single carport and alfresco space overlook a lawn area and the land including the dam beyond. A variety of outbuildings provide storage for wood and tools. The land is fully fenced and split into four fenced paddocks.
Additional features include:
- Split system heating and cooling
- Solid fuel heating
- Ceiling fans throughout
- Stove with separate grill and four-burner gas cooktop
- Various outbuildings
- Four fenced paddocks
- Dam
- 2mg water entitlement from Loddon River
- Water tanks
This property is absolutely ideal for a buyer who is seeking a pocket of land for horses, sheep or planting, but still wants easy access to city amenities along with fishing, cycling, hiking and boating. With minor cosmetic changes ensuring this would make a charming country home, the land and water provide all you need to enjoy a simple and relaxed rural lifestyle. Currently leased to great tenants... vacant possession is available.

Description:
2 ACRES (8161sqm) ONLY MINUTES TO BENDIGO CBD
Build your dream home and enjoy the tranquility, peace and quiet of this tucked away location on a lightly treed and elevated 2 acre (0.82ha) allotment just off Holdsworth Road. A 3 lot subdivision had previously been approved, so the potential is also there to subdivide into 2 or 3 lots (STCA).
With option to access from Latham Street or Degille Street, you are surrounded by nature reserves and walking tracks, while being located a quick drive to Bendigo Health, Lake Weeroona and the CBD in one direction, or Eaglehawk in the other direction. North Bendigo Preschool, White Hills Primary, Saint Peters Primary and Weeroona College are all conveniently nearby. All services are also available or nearby.
It is certainly rare to find a piece of land this size so close to so many amenities!
Contact Shelby Healey on 0428 488 685 for further information.

Description:
GLENIRA CHARMING COTTAGE NEAR CITY CENTRE
This pretty heritage cottage is located just five minutes walk to Bendigos train station, providing easy access to the very heart of the city and all its amenities. Sitting on the edge of the industrial hub of Golden Square and offering varied zoning, the property is positioned in a locale ensuring that it may be easily utilised for a variety of purposes be it business-based or simply convenient city living.
The refurbished weatherboard cottage offers many heritage features such as original timber flooring, sash windows and high ceilings and the exterior features a charming bullnose verandah with decorative iron lacework behind a lawn area and rose bushes. Indoors, a central hallway leads on either side to spacious bedrooms, one with an open fireplace and timber mantle.
At the end of the hallway is a good-sized lounge room with a gas log fire inserted in the original fireplace, perfect for cosy winter evenings. A door leads from this room to the rear garden. Off the lounge is a spacious room that could serve as a third bedroom, or a formal dining space. Beyond the lounge is a contemporary kitchen with ample storage and a servery window overlooking the alfresco outdoors. Off the kitchen is a small hallway leading down to a separate toilet; a large laundry and utility room; and a family bathroom.
Outdoors, a deck wraps around the rear and side of the home, with a verandah off the back of the house keeping much of this outdoor living space undercover. This fantastic entertaining area overlooks the private rear yard, which is mainly set to lawn and includes a garden shed. Double gates at the side off the house allow easy vehicle access to the back garden.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling in lounge
Gas log fire
Open fireplace
Contemporary kitchen with dishwasher, oven and four-burner gas cooktop
Gas hot water
Garden shed
Secure vehicle access to rear yard
Residential and Business 3 zoning
Absolutely ideal for a buyer seeking a character home in a central locale, this neat and tidy property is also perfect for an investor looking for an easy-care, long- or short-term rental, or someone wanting to run a business from a traditional Victorian cottage near all amenities.
